Package equations_solver

Class MatrixInverse

  • java.lang.Object
    • equations_solver.MatrixInverse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodsOfSolvingLinearEquations
    class MatrixInverse
extends java.lang.Object
implements MethodsOfSolvingLinearEquations
    The class solves linear equations with Matrix Inverse method.
